blogPost.excerpt:
Prince Harry and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, compared Meghan's treatment by the tabloid press to that of Kate, Duchess of Windsor, and Buckingham Palace's reactions to the coverage in this previously unaired clip of Oprah Winfrey's wide-ranging interview with the couple.

Each weekday morning, "CBS This Morning" co-hosts Gayle King, Anthony Mason and Tony Dokoupil deliver two hours of original reporting, breaking news and top-level newsmaker interviews in an engaging and informative format that challenges the norm in network morning news programs. The broadcast has earned a prestigious Peabody Award, a Polk Award, four News & Documentary Emmys, three Daytime Emmys and the 2017 Edward R. Murrow Award for Best Newscast. The broadcast was also honored with an Alfred I. duPont-Columbia Award as part of CBS News division-wide coverage of the shootings at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut. Check local listings for "CBS This Morning" broadcast times.

localize.title: 哈里和梅根在英国的新闻报道中如何考虑到种族因素。
localize.description:
哈里王子和苏塞克斯公爵夫人梅根，在这段之前未播出的奥普拉-温弗瑞（Oprah Winfrey）对这对夫妇进行广泛采访的片段中，比较了梅根受到小报媒体的待遇和温莎公爵夫人凯特的待遇，以及白金汉宫对报道的反应。

next.excerpt:
The wait is finally over. Last night, the world finally got to see Harry and Meghan’s tell-all interview with Oprah Winfrey. But what “truths” were spoken? And how will the palace react? Our Royal editor Camilla Tominey joins us live in the studio to tell us more. We'll also be joined exclusively by the authors of Harry and Meghan biography ‘Finding Freedom’, Omid Scobie and Carolyn Durand, to share their first thoughts.
Broadcast on 08/03/21
Subscribe now for more! http://bit.ly/1JM41yF

Website: http://bit.ly/1MsreVq
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thismorning

Twitter: https://twitter.com/thismorning

Dr Zoe and Dr Ranj answer all your health questions, stay stylish with Gok Wan's fabulous fashion, be beautiful with Bryony Blake's top make-up tips, and save money with Martin Lewis.

localize.title: 哈里和梅根的采访让菲利普对皇室夫妇感到同情｜今日早报
localize.description:
等待终于结束了。昨晚，全世界终于看到了哈里和梅根接受奥普拉-温弗瑞的倾诉采访。但是，他们说了哪些 "真话"？宫廷又会有什么反应呢？我们的皇家编辑卡米拉-托米尼加入我们的直播室，告诉我们更多。哈里和梅根传记《寻找自由》的作者Omid Scobie和Carolyn Durand也将独家加入我们，分享他们的初衷。
播出时间：08/03/21
